00025 namespace litesql {
00026 
00031 class Persistent {
00032 protected:
00033     typedef map<string, vector<pair<FieldType, string> > > Updates;
00035     string insert(Record& tables, 
00036                               Records& fieldRecs,
00037                               Records& values,
00038                               const string& sequence);
00039     void update(Updates& updates); 
00040     template <class T>
00041     void updateField(litesql::Persistent::Updates& updates, 
00042                      const std::string& table, 
00043                      litesql::Field<T> fld) {
00044         if (fld.modified()) {
00045             updates[table].push_back(make_pair(fld.fieldType(), 
00046                        litesql::convert<const T&, std::string>(fld.value())));
00047             fld.setModified(false);
00048         }
00049     }
00050     void prepareUpdate(Updates& updates, string table);
00051     void deleteFromTable(string table, string id);
00055     const Database *db;
00058     bool inDatabase;
00062     int oldKey;
00063 public:
00065     const Database & getDatabase() const {
00066         return *db;
00067     }
00069     bool isInDatabase() const {
00070         return inDatabase;
00071     }
00073     const Persistent & operator=(const Persistent & p);
00075     Persistent(const Persistent & p) 
00076         : db(p.db), inDatabase(p.inDatabase), oldKey(p.oldKey) {}
00077     Persistent(const Database & _db, const Record & row) 
00078         : db(&_db), inDatabase(true), oldKey(0) {
00079         if (row.size() > 0)
00080             oldKey = atoi(row[0]);
00081     }
00083     Persistent(const Database & _db) 
00084         : db(&_db), inDatabase(false), oldKey(0) {}
00085     virtual void onDelete() {}
00087     virtual ~Persistent() {}
00090     static Split getTablesFromFieldTypes(const std::vector<FieldType> & fdatas);
00093     virtual void getTables(Split & tables) const {  }
00094 };
00095 
00096 }
00097 #endif
